definitions.text: the contentment one feels when one has fulfilled a desire, need, or expectation
examples: the chef tasted the sauce with great satisfaction

definitions.text: state of being gratified or satisfied
examples: dull repetitious work gives no gratification
to my immense gratification he arrived on time
we were unable to get satisfaction from the local store

definitions.text: (law) the payment of a debt or fulfillment of an obligation
examples: the full and final satisfaction of the claim

definitions.text: act of fulfilling a desire or need or appetite
examples: the satisfaction of their demand for better services
